name: Cottage Gore (ONLINE)
description:
Note : NEWEST Version with working stats screen at the end -  https://we.tl/t-apdODLO1Ck

Play as a normal swan, enjoying the paradisical nature surrounding you - by entering a murderous breadlust! Those damn humans keep having picnics and hoarding all that sweet bread for themselves - that means they must die, horribly.

Run, jump, and spin with grace as you equip weapons of increasing power and acquire scrumptious bread.

Kill at least 250 people to win!

How to play:

- WASD to move.

- Spacebar to jump.

- Left Shift to sprint.

- Left Mouse Button to spin around to attack.

THE LEVEL TAKES A WHILE TO LOAD - SO PLEASE BE PATIENT DURING LOADING SCREEN :-)

Developers:

LaurJam: Audio, Programming, Voice Acting

Busser: Programming, Post-processing, VFX

 Soondun: Programming, Voice Acting

SoBigMuscles: Art, Voice Acting

MilleHafnar: Art, Voice Acting
